trends: There have been no other sightings in Calais
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi just got of the navy in 1955 july was the date it took a bought a week to get a new car and my father, mother, aunt,and me driveing the car going to canada, this all happen on the way back to the states. we came over the boader at[caley main] a bought 3:am in the morning we got a bought 20 miles down the road they were bulding the trancanada hiway at the time and the road was not paved, i came to a guley in the road and ai was only moveing at a bought 5 miles a hour, when the road lit up amber and a bright round lite came up the road at the driver front wheel it was a bought 8 ft. in diameter and it not on the road that i could see and i was going real slow[5 miles hour]it had to be under the dirt road ,it past by the drivers window and my arm a bought 3 foot and i went on down the road a bought a mile and i could see it in my rear vieu and it came up to the trunk of the car and near the rear window my aunt and the other women got on the floor and they screaming my father and mother, were in front seat with me and they would look back and i could not get out of their fast enough fo me, i was 23 years old ,and it stop and let me get down the road a bought a mile and it came up to the car a bought 4 times just then i came to a farmers lite on the side of road did not see him ,and the right front tire melted at the seam it was a tubeless tire and the next town i had to put a tube in it. i was thinking bought it i am 75 now and i wanted to let things out. this thing had intel it new what it was doing. [cms\tg\pid]
